channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Accelerate your move to Microsoft Sentinel with the new AI Powered SIEM migration experience
item.description: Migrating from one SIEM to another is a critical decision—and often one of the hardest to execute. Legacy SIEM migrations are complex, resource-heavy, and time-consuming, often taking up to 15 months with extensive manual effort and cross-team coordination. Organizations face hurdles like multi-phased processes, translating and validating hundreds of detection rules, mapping diverse data sources, and maintaining operational continuity. These challenges have historically slowed cloud adoption and driven up migration costs. At Ignite 2025, we unveiled the new AI-powered SIEM migration experience...
